Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Observation
b) Defect Observed: Trim tab actuator binding. Malfunction reported by flight crew.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Inadequate maintenance procedure resulting in improper installation
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Door Mechanism component. Physical
examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.
c) Remedial Measures Replace entire assembly due to extent of damage
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Implement condition-based monitoring system
d) Attributable Code: N2 - Defect Not Confirmed
Remarks: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions.
Date: 02/04/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta
